document_data.name: Radiant Ship
document_data.mainbody: '''Radiant ships''' were flying [[spelljammer]] ships of [[elf|elven]] design. They were as bright as suns and were used to illuminate elven fleets in the darkness of [[wildspace]].
document_data.Description:
The entire hulls of radiant ships were enchanted with ''[[continual light]]'' spells. They were so bright that their crews needed to wear special goggles known as ''[[goggles of darkness]]'' to be able to see while on board without going blind. Thanks to this extreme brightness, radiant ships were also extraordinarily difficult to target by enemy attackers.

Radiant ships needed a minimum crew of four to operate. The maximum compliment a radiant ship could hold without compromising its air supply was 25 individuals.
